source-layers.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT the_geom_webmercator, to_char(effective, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as effectiveformatted, extract(epoch from effective) * 1000 as effective_epoch, ulurpno, status, project_na FROM planninglabs.zoning_map_amendments_v20181206 WHERE status = 'Adopted') a

meta.description: NYC GIS Zoning Features December 2018, Bytes of the Big Apple
